document.full_text: the evangelical christian broadcaster whose much-ballyhooed judgment day prophecy went conspicuously unfulfilled on saturday has a simple explanation for what went wrong -- he miscalculated.
document.title: judgment day forecaster points to new doomsday date
lines_and_colors: the evangelical christian broadcaster whose much-ballyhooed judgment day prophecy went conspicuously unfulfilled on saturday has a simple explanation for what went wrong -- he miscalculated.
